title: ‘Balls of steel’: Kung Fu master demonstrates power of his crotch in nut-cracking video — RT Viral
text:
‘Balls of steel’: Kung Fu master demonstrates power of his crotch in nut-cracking video Published time: 19 Feb, 2017 05:44 Get short URL © Ruptly A Chinese Kung Fu master and his students have publicly demonstrated their 'ball-breaking stamina,' taking mighty blows to their private parts, and the teacher claiming the practice cures erectile dysfunction and premature ejaculation. 
The cringe-worthy footage shows ‘Iron Crotch Kung Fu’ Master Wei Yaobin and his disciples honing their art in public by taking powerful hits to their 'crown jewels.' 
“I have learned this Kung Fu skill since I turned 67 years old. I think it is good for my health. I insist on doing it every day. I believe it builds up resistance and I have got less fever and cold than before,” the master said. 
The master has been polishing his skill with a relentless training regimen for ten years now. Despite a lack of scientific proof, ‘Iron Crotch Kung Fu’ adherents believe that the practice is essential for male sex health and helps counter such problems as erectile dysfunction and premature ejaculation. 
The video shows the master and his disciples taking blows to their testicles with hands, feet and even a medieval looking device suitable for breaching gates. The master claims that his art is rapidly gaining popularity with the emergence of new schools following the path of ‘Iron Crotch.' 
“It was the kind of Kung Fu which can only be inherited by family members. I learned it from Master Wang Yongzhi. With time, we want it to be more popular and accepted by the public. More and more masters are opening studios to teach it and attracting an increasing number of people to learn it,” the master said. 
Witnesses to the training session in the Chinese city of Luoyang seemed to be fascinated, admiring the 'ballsy' courage and toughness of the Kung Fu enthusiasts. 
“I am shocked,” said one passerby. “It is supposed to be the weakest part of a man, but it is the strongest part of a man now. I am so shocked.”
